nodes.text: Mattenic was a individual who worked as a lieutenant for the crime lord Nirama during the time of the Clone Wars.

When the Hutt Riboga returned to the Cularin system and deposed Nirama to regain control of crime in the system, Mattenic and Kerkum, another of Nirama's lieutenants, went into hiding inside an abandoned factory situated in the city Gadrin on the planet Cularin. The Heroes of Cularin traveled to the factory to meet with the pair, but encountered a group of bounty hunters who had been sent by Riboga to capture Mattenic and Kerkum.
